name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ideal Postcodes Rapid Address Entry Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable rapid address search and validation on your UK address forms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add UK address validation, like address autocompletion and postcode lookup to popular web applications. 

Works with a number of popular CRM, eCommerce and account platforms. Complete list of integrations can be found here: https://docs.ideal-postcodes.co.uk/docs/integrations/browser-extension
